Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Adjuvant/Astringent/Domeboro Solution
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A aluminum solution with astringent, antibacterial, and antifungal properties. Domeboro solution is a commercial preparation of modified Burow's solution, (5% aluminum acetate) by Bayer. Aluminum sulfate, the active ingredient of Domeboro, is attributed for this agent's bacteriostatic effect. Domeboro is used most often to cleanse irritated skin and soothe inflammation.
